name: Binh Minh Hotel - 84 Ngoc Khanh
address: 21, 84 Lane, Ngoc Khanh Street, Ba Dinh District, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Ideal for fun and relaxation, Binh Minh Hotel - 84 Ngoc Khanh is located in the Ba Dinh District area of Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. For sightseeing options and local attractions, one need not look far as the hotel enjoys close proximity to Embassy of Spain, Tohe Style, Embassy of Finland.

At Binh Minh Hotel - 84 Ngoc Khanh, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park to ensure our guests the greatest comfort.

The ambiance of Binh Minh Hotel - 84 Ngoc Khanh is reflected in every guestroom. television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Superb facilities and an excellent location make the Binh Minh Hotel - 84 Ngoc Khanh the perfect base from which to enjoy your stay in Hanoi.
